content:
"Add stream" confuses with "creating a new stream" for users(from https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/14880).
I think renaming it to 'Subscribe new streams' or 'All streams' would fit well as it links to All streams modal. Is this ok to implement name.png ?
I think we have a fairly recent issue to fix this. Feel free to submit a PR. I think we reached some consensus that “add stream” is indeed confusing.
I'd prefer labeling the link More streams over Subscribe to new streams since it's more succinct.
what do you guys think about this?
I think we want "subscribe" to avoid any confusion.
how could More streams be confusing?
because the user might think clicking it is supposed to just show more streams
which it does
So I think the problem rather is that the "All streams" tab doesn't make it obvious how to subscribe to a stream if you haven't done it before.
or "Browse All streams" (from slack)

The Feel the "Add streams" at the bottom the streams list is a bad choice since it not visible at all to me unless I scroll to the bottom. We can use the design which is followed by almost all our competitors - A + icon in the STREAMS navbar. (Always visible)
Yeah..i was about to write this too
It should work is a similar way how "Invite more users" on buddy list work
Here's a thing I was playing with a while ago:

Aman Agrawal said:

The Feel the "Add streams" at the bottom the streams list is a bad choice since it not visible at all to me unless I scroll to the bottom. We can use the design which is followed by almost all our competitors - A + icon in the STREAMS navbar. (Always visible)

I remember last year I also discussed and raised similar point i guess, not sure when and where :P
I firstly didn't recognize that this was a compass so I think a plus is better since it's more easily understood.
I'll mention that I'd like to change the "gear" we have at the top, near the "STREAMS" label as well...
gear is well understood as "configure" so I think it makes sense
That's fair. It still just feels off to me that we have two gear icons that have very different actions.
My reasons for not wanting a + here are similar to those for not wanting "add"
Also, I think having this be at the bottom of the stream list is a good idea for new users....

Oh.

I think this might actually be the only UI element that directly suggests that "there are other streams".
Our on-boarding process does not involve stream subscription.
Add streams could be an icon in the streams tab itself too i.e next to the search and gear. Was that considered before?

Aman Agrawal said:

The Feel the "Add streams" at the bottom the streams list is a bad choice since it not visible at all to me unless I scroll to the bottom. We can use the design which is followed by almost all our competitors - A + icon in the STREAMS navbar. (Always visible)

.
I opened #16562 in case we want to execute on that idea.
(We could atleast experiment on new designs since it is clear that we don't like the current one.)

Hi, I was going thorough some of the good first issues and found that I could work on Rename Add streams #14880. From the comments on the that issue I found the wording needs to be discussed, so how would More streams look, since it justifies the purpose of finding more already existing streams.
Also I found this pull request from Aman Agrawal which is about putting this functionality at the top beside the search icon so should I work on this issue for changing the wording or it is solved by the linked pull request ?
Also I found this comment, so I am doubtful if this issue is already resolved or should I continue to work on it?
@Purushottam Tiwari I don't think we need more PRs for this issue. #16562 and #15041 are two ways this could possibly go.
Thanks for your interest.
Oh, okk I would look for some other issues to work on!!! :smile:

So, in the same context, we also have an invite button on the right which remains fixed when we scroll. Maybe that's the behavior we want with Add Stream as well.

On the other hand, if Add Stream moves up as an icon, why not the Invite more users button as well?
